game.name: Oradea
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Steam Workshop, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Touch Only Option, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A rhythm game with a hexagonal twist. Notes flow from the center to the edges of one of the six segments. Play on your controller, touchscreen or keyboard!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A rhythm game with a hexagonal twist. Notes flow from the center to the edges of one of the six segments. Play on your controller, touchscreen or keyboard!
